languages.text: Раны покойника нанесены без особой системы, словно убийцу вела тупая жестокость.
The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer was driven by pure brutality.
languages.original_text: Раны покойника нанесены без особой системы, словно убийцу вела тупая жестокость.

traits.locale_text: The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer was driven by pure brutality.
The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer was driven by pure brutality.
The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer had been driven by pure brutality.
The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer had been driven by pure brutality.
The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer was driven by pure brutality.
The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer was driven by pure brutality.

languages.text: 死体の傷は無造作につけられており、まるで犯人は純粋な残忍さに駆られていたかのようだった。
languages.original_text: The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer was driven by pure brutality.

traits.locale_text: 死体の傷は無造作につけられており、まるで犯人は純粋な残忍さに駆られていたかのようだった。

languages.text: 尸体上的伤口看起来像是漫不经心划上去的。凶手这么做，似乎是出于纯粹的恶毒与残忍。
languages.original_text: The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer was driven by pure brutality.

traits.locale_text: 尸体上的伤口看起来像是漫不经心划上去的。凶手这么做，似乎是出于纯粹的恶毒与残忍。

languages.text: Las heridas del cadáver se infligieron al azar, como si el asesino se hubiera dejado llevar por la brutalidad del momento.
languages.original_text: The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer was driven by pure brutality.

traits.locale_text: Las heridas del cadáver se infligieron al azar, como si el asesino se hubiera dejado llevar por la brutalidad del momento.

languages.text: Die Wunden der Leiche wurden willkürlich und chaotisch zugefügt, als sei der Mörder von purer Brutalität getrieben worden.
languages.original_text: The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer was driven by pure brutality.

traits.locale_text: Die Wunden der Leiche wurden willkürlich und chaotisch zugefügt, als sei der Mörder von purer Brutalität getrieben worden.

languages.text: Les lacérations semblent avoir été infligées au hasard, comme si l'assassin avait tout simplement laissé libre cours à sa sauvagerie.
languages.original_text: The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer was driven by pure brutality.

traits.locale_text: Les lacérations semblent avoir été infligées au hasard, comme si l'assassin avait tout simplement laissé libre cours à sa sauvagerie.

languages.text: Cesedin üzerindeki yaralar, sanki katil saf bir gaddarlıkla işini bitirmiş gibi gelişigüzel bir şekilde oluşturulmuş.
languages.original_text: The wounds on the corpse were inflicted haphazardly, as if the killer was driven by pure brutality.

traits.locale_text: Cesedin üzerindeki yaralar, sanki katili saf bir gaddarlıkla hareket etmiş gibi gelişigüzel bir şekilde oluşturulmuş.
